properties.name: fuo.serialize.writeMapNullValue
properties.description: fuo-json序列化输出时,是否输出值为null的字段,默认为false

properties.name: fuo.serialize.writeNullStringAsEmpty
properties.description: fuo-json序列化输出时,字符类型字段如果为null,输出为"",而非null,默认为false

properties.name: fuo.serialize.writeNullNumberAsZero
properties.description: fuo-json序列化输出时,数值字段如果为null,输出为0,而非null,默认为false

properties.name: fuo.serialize.json.formats
properties.description: fuo-json序列化输出时,自定义格式化输出
